step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Remember to keep your arm straight overhead, feeling that gentle resistance.
You're doing great! Ensure your arm remains extended overhead throughout the exercise.
Excellent! Keep your palm and fingers spread wide open.
Nicely done! Make a tight fist while inhaling and engaging your muscles.
Good start on your second repetition. Keep that arm extended overhead and feel the stretch.
You're maintaining good form. Continue to keep your arm straight overhead.
Great job keeping your hand open and fingers wide. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Excellent! You're making a tight fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a tight fist while inhaling, relaxing as you exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
